name: Tocmoc
0:
”Alexa, turn on vacuum.”
”Alexa, turn off vacuum.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Link your T-home account to control your Tocmoc vacuum cleaner by saying to Alexa. You can turn on / off just by saying: "Alexa, turn on vacuum" or "Alexa, turn off vacuum". Here "vacuum" is your Tocmoc vacuum name.
